description: "How are our supplies?" you ask. "Should be alright. Stuck in the snow for as long as we were during that last storm, we might have dug into our reserver a bit, but provided this calm weather holds we should be able to make it back. At least we don't have to worry about spoilage in this weather."

options.success: "Thanks for the update, Robert." You turn your attention back to the trees before you.
